title: Streamlined Mythbusters Complete (as of August 23rd, 2013)
description:
This is a compilation of all current(as of August 23, 2013) streamlined Mythbusters episodes. These 'Streamline' edits run shorter because they are missing teasers, cartoons, flashbacks, repetition, idents, history lessons, fun facts, "we're experts", and anything else that slows down the show.

This is Mythbusters, the way it's meant to be seen.

All credit for these edits goes to reddit users Postdarwin, Runke, Myfbusted, MrTwinkles, Realblublu, Ram27, DeLoRtEd1, and Arantius. Postdarwin created the subreddit /r/smyths and you should go there if you want to find more streamlined episodes.
